intro: Cremanthodium sino-oblongatum, commonly known as the Chinese cremanthodium, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features small, yellow flowers arranged in a clustered inflorescence, typical of the daisy family. It has narrow, linear leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Cremanthodium sino-oblongatum is typically found in alpine or rocky habitats, thriving in high-altitude environments.
